name: stamp-versions-task
description: Stamps version information in various source files, including *AssemblyInfo.cs, *.nuspec, *.vsixmanifest, and *.csproj files.
helpMarkDown: `AssemblyVersion` attributes will be set to `{majorVersion}.{minorVersion}.{patchVersion}.0`. `AssemblyFileVersion` attributes will be set to `{majorVersion}.{minorVersion}.{dateStamp}.{revision}`. `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attributes, NuGet package versions, and VSIX versions will be set to either `{majorVersion}.{minorVersion}.{patchVersion}` or `{majorVersion}.{minorVersion}.{patchVersion}-{prereleaseLabel}{prereleaseRevision}`.
author: Chris Dahlberg

inputs.name: SourcesDirectory
inputs.label: Sources Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory containing files to stamp version numbers in.

inputs.name: ProductName
inputs.label: Product Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the product being versioned. This is used when generating unique revision numbers.

inputs.name: MajorVersion
inputs.label: Major Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The major version (the first part of the version).

inputs.name: MinorVersion
inputs.label: Minor Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The minor version (the second part of the version).

inputs.name: PatchVersion
inputs.label: Patch Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The patch version (the third part of the version).

inputs.name: ShouldCreatePrereleaseVersion
inputs.label: Create Prerelease Version?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether 'Prerelease Label' should be included in NuGet package and assembly informational versions.

inputs.name: PrereleaseLabel
inputs.label: Prerelease Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pre-release label to use (e.g. `beta`, `prerelease`, etc.).

inputs.name: ShouldSetReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Set Release Notes?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether release notes for NuGet packages should be set in .nuspec and .csproj files.

inputs.name: ReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The release notes to set for NuGet packages.

inputs.name: ShouldOverrideAssemblyFileVersionRevision
inputs.label: Override the revision used for AssemblyFileVersion?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether 'AssemblyFileVersion Revision Override' should be used instead of a calculated value when determining AssemblyFileVersion.

inputs.name: AssemblyFileVersionRevisionOverride
inputs.label: AssemblyFileVersion Revision Override
inputs.helpMarkDown: The revision (the fourth part of the version) to use for AssemblyFileVersion.

inputs.name: ShouldOverridePackagePrereleaseVersionRevision
inputs.label: Override the revision used for prerelease package versions?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether 'Package Prerelease Version Revision Override' should be used instead of a calculated value when determining a prerelease NuGet package version.

inputs.name: PackagePrereleaseVersionRevisionOverride
inputs.label: Package Prerelease Version Revision Override
inputs.helpMarkDown: The revision (the number after the PrereleaseLabel) to use for a prerelease package.
